 1. Kelly Jiang, Councilmember

# Kelly Jiang, Councilmember

## About

Councilmember Jiang currently holds Position Number 6 on the City Council.

 * Appointed: Feb. 10, 2025
 * Term Expires: November 2025

On Feb. 10, 2025 the City Council appointed Kelly Jiang to serve on the City Council, replacing Victoria Hunt. 

Councilmember Jiang’s appointment runs until the certification of the next general election in November. The vacant position will then be on the ballot for election to serve the remaining two years on Hunt’s City Council term.
